name: fullstackopen-2024-part3
description: This repository contains all coursework for part3 of Full Stack Open, started in 2024.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../fullStackOpen-2024/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../../fullStackOpen-2024-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
